TEXT.TITLE: Zamzani Abdul Wahab (Chef Zam)
TEXT.PARAGRAPH: Zamzani Abdul Wahab , popularly known as Chef Zam is currently the Head of Special Projects at KDU College's School of Hospitality, Tourism & Culinary Arts, Selangor, Malaysia for the past 11 years. he holds an Associate of Science degree in Hotel-Restaurant Management and a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Hotel-Restaurant/Institutional Management (both from Johnson & Wales University, Providence, United States), as well as a Master of Arts degree in Hospitality Management from Thames Valley University in London. he is also the one and only celebrity chef in Malaysia with a Post-Graduate qualification to date.
Among his successful TV programs & TV commercials:

#Garam Gula #Romancing February #Rahsia Rasa... MMVitaOils #Aroma Selebriti... MMVitaOils #Ole-Ole Malaysia #The Malaysian Invasions (USA) #Sucre Fest met Chef Zam (The Nederlands) #Pasangan Ideal #Serimas...Selera Dunia #Chef Pilihan S&P Santan #Berat Badan Unggul #Tak Tahan #Chef Selebriti Reality TV (Suria TV, Singapore) #The Flaming Chef (USA) #Kuih Raya: Juara Antara Kolej 2008 #KanCheong Kitchen #Sajian Ramadhan 2008
